data.title: The First to be Destroyed: The Jewish Community of Kleczew and the Beginning of the Final Solution 9781618112859
data.meta_description: Kleczew is a small locality in Eastern Greater Poland, in Greater Poland Province (Wielkopolska), Konin County. At prese...
